title: Did My Co-worker Stab Me in the Back?
description:
After hearing Dr. Laura discuss her book, “Surviving a Shark Attack (on Land),” Richard calls to ask if he is correct in thinking his co-worker was a shark. - Dr. Laura: "He screwed you over, but it worked out in your favor."

Has a co-worker done you wrong? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

What should we do when we've been wronged? In "Surviving a Shark Attack (On Land)," I wrote about overcoming betrayal, humiliation, and pain, including how I've faced challenges in my own life. For a limited time, get the eBook for $1.99 when you click here - https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-surviving-a-shark-attack-on-land

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
